column1: '''''Middle-earth CCG Maps''''' is a map-book for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game

In this set you get a 17" X 11.5" map (three-hole drilled and folded to fit in a standard three-ring binder), and a 23.5" X 17" map (includes complete information on which types of cards are playable at each site). Both are printed on a durable plastic-paper that resists stains and normal wear and tear. The full-color interior of this slip cover can be used as an insert cover of a 3-ring binder with clear plastic cover sleeves.
